title: Gee I wish I were a Man, I'd Join the Navy
description: On white background to the left is a young woman wearing a sailor uniform.  She smiles, grabbing her shirt while a gust of wind blows from behind.  To the right the text reads: " Gee!! I Wish I Were A Man/ I'd Join the Navy".  At bottom center: " Be a Man And Do It/ United Stated Navy Recruiting Station".
name: Poster
